revised_title: Extraordinary Turnip Growth: A Case Study by Dr. J. Theoph. Desaguliers
tldr: Dr. J. Theoph. Desaguliers shares instances of unusually rapid and massive turnip growth in Sutton Coldfield, Warwickshire. A turnip was harvested after six weeks that weighed over two pounds and fourteen ounces, originating from a single seed. The author also discusses the weight increase of turnip seeds over time and the potential for turnips to grow even larger.
